name: Zombieverse
description:
WOW! WHAT IS THAT?

Zombieverse is a top-down shooter set in a cyberpunk zombie wasteland.
In 2069 the Metaworld is real - and it brainwashed every single person around the globe, your mom included!

Thankfully, you had your adblocker on and now you are ready to gun down hordes of cyber zombies to get your revenge and end Zack Muckenberg's tyranny.

DEVELOPED BY

Wait, who?

Game Design

Davide Meli | Davide Perdon | Mattia Radaelli | Chiara Sanviti

Art

Sofia Malossini | Andrea Molteni | Davide Prodi | Sarah Rusmiputro

Programming

Martin Babino

Soundtracks

Grossamer Studio [LMS-JM]

FOLLOW US!
